Title: Ramanujan favourite number 1729
blockquote: ---I remember once going to see him when he was ill at Putney. I had ridden in taxi cab number 1729
Description: 1729, the Hardy-Ramanujan Number, is the smallest number which can be expressed as the sum of two different cubes in twodifferent ways.
1729 is also the sum of the cubes of 12 and 1. Cube of 12 is 1728 and the cube of 1 is 1. Both the cubes, therefore, add up to 1729.
